title: The Mermaid Who Didn’t Know the Sea - Novel Updates
tags: Animal Characteristics   Average-looking Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Humanoid Protagonist   Long Separations   Naive Protagonist   Oneshot   Unrequited Love
author: 不知海
description:
The afternoon sun was shining, and the wind blew in from the forest with the smell of greenery.

In the mermaid’s memory, a young man smiled like the sun.

—Once upon a time, there was a mermaid who had never seen the ocean.>
